i18n.title: Python Snake Case Conversion
i18n.description: In Python, snake case is a naming convention where words are separated by underscores. This is commonly used for naming variables, functions, and other identifiers. However, sometimes we may have strings that are not in snake case and we need to convert them. In this challenge, you will be tasked with writing a Python function that converts a string to snake case.

meta.title: Python | Snake Case Conversion | String Manipulation
meta.description: Learn how to convert strings to snake case using Python. Discover a powerful function that handles a variety of input formats, including camelCase, mixed-case, and hyphenated strings.
meta.keywords: Python, snake case, string conversion, string manipulation, camelCase, mixed-case, hyphenated strings

i18n.title: Python 蛇形命名法转换
i18n.description: 在Python中，蛇形命名法是一种命名约定，其中单词由下划线分隔。这通常用于命名变量、函数和其他标识符。然而，有时我们可能会遇到不是蛇形命名法的字符串，我们需要对其进行转换。在这个挑战中，你将负责编写一个将字符串转换为蛇形命名法的Python函数。

meta.title: Python | 蛇形命名法转换 | 字符串操作
meta.description: 学习如何使用Python将字符串转换为蛇形命名法。探索一个强大的函数，它可以处理各种输入格式，包括驼峰命名法、混合大小写和带连字符的字符串。
